Title: Der 8. Kontinent
Actors: Maike Johanna Reuter, Thomas Scharff, Cosma Shiva Hagen, Viktoria Brams
Plot: Lena is a student who shortly after her mother's death discovers her letters dedicated to Lena. She decides to make her mother's dream come true by setting out on a 5 week around the world trip - a journey that will change her life forever.
Country: Germany, USA, South Africa, Norway, Italy, Hong Kong, Brazil, Australia
